alternatives.transcript: you probably wondered how we can make a cigarette that practically eliminates secondhand smoke now you can find out you'll be among the first to try this cigarette and we're very interested in how you like it so we've given you a questionnaire please take a moment to fill it out after the video is finished we'll invite you to try your first test cigarette as you watch this video we've timed it so if you light up when we do we'll be finishing our cigarettes and the video at approximately the same time

this is a new kind of cigarettes rather than Burns most of the tobacco you light a small pure form and heat Source here which creates hot air when you draw that picks up flavor from a special blend of fine tobacco's here and passes through a regular cigarette filter with this design the cigarette doesn't burn down and doesn't leave any Ashes to light the test cigarette you need a name a lighter works best hold the flame a little longer than usual and take an extra Puff
are you ready let's light up now you can make sure your cigarette is lit by checking at the carbon tip is glowing red if it isn't simply try again
in our brochure we talk about a 95 percent reduction in second hand smoke so take a good look and see what difference it makes first look at the smoke that comes from the lit end between puffs
now take a look at the smoke you exhale how many seconds does it take to disappear

there's a simple reason for the way it dissipates so fast all cigarette smoke contains some water and glycerin Vapor the exhales smoke from a usual brand only a small amount but the exhaled smoke from the test cigarette is mostly water and glycerin

glycerin in case you were wondering is a colorless odorless sweet-tasting liquid it's an ingredient in many foods advaita prizes like water so when you exhale most of the smoke dissipates much as your breath does on a cold morning

another major benefit mentioned in our brochure is reduced odor how does your room smell now think of how the room smells when you smoke your usual brand is the odor different than what you're used to do you think others will appreciate the difference less smoke and odor are things you notice right away but the test cigarette has other benefits that you'll only notice later because the test cigarette would secondhand smoke by 95% it won't leave stains on your curtains walls

or Windows it might take awhile to see that difference but here's a demonstration that will show you immediately take a look at the Smoky exhales from his old brand compared to the test cigarette the cigarette he's lighting now is the leading brand next you'll take a piece of curtain fabric and fold it you could later using a napkin if you like now he'll take a puff and hold the fabric tight over his lips so all the air goes through when he exhales
look at the fabric
Bell she'll do the same with the test cigarette she's also exhaling through the fabric
look at the two pieces side by side you can see why the test cigarette never leave stains on your curtains walls or Windows
while we have both kinds of cigarettes lit up will give you a close-up look notice any other differences
as we said the test cigarette doesn't burn down and doesn't leave any ashes
not burning down has some other advantages you can lay it on its side and it won't burn the table you can even put it on a piece of paper
and no burn marks

but as with any cigarette be careful the tip remains hot while you're smoking and even for a short time after you're finished the test cigarette last about as long as your usual brand about 12 to 14 Puffs if you'd like go ahead and count them next time you light one up
you know the test cigarette is finished when you stop getting smoke don't try to relight it
dispose of the test cigarette properly just as you would your usual cigarettes only there's no Ashes to clean up

well sign off now and ask you to fill out the first question are while the experience is fresh in your mind in a few days when you finished your supply we'd like you to rate the test cigarette again and fill out the second question are we'd like to know if your experience changes after smoking a thank you for your time and for your interest
